name: Wework
description: Whether you’re an established enterprise or a growing startup, discover flexible spaces and solutions to move your business forward with WeWork. Welcome to the workplace of tomorrow. Optimize your office footprint with WeWork and save on your real estate costs while expanding your team’s access to best-in-class office space. Empower your teams to work wherever they are with WeWork’s global locations and suite of innovative solutions.
features: A global portfolio that works for you
Headline: Reimagine your workspace.
ShortDescription: Flexible office is a powerful part of workplace strategy

Highlights.name: A global portfolio that works for you
Highlights.description: WeWork offers a range of enterprise workspace solutions from coworking memberships to private offices and full-floors at hundreds of locations across 30+ countries.

Highlights.name: Spaces for productivity and collaboration
Highlights.description: Our move-in ready spaces are designed leveraging our insights and best practices to bring teams together and do their best work.

Highlights.name: The flexibility to adapt
Highlights.description: Future-proof your business with flexible options designed for your unique needs. Choose from a selection of personalized options to make the space your own.

enhanced_description: WeWork provides flexible workspace solutions, including coworking memberships, private offices, and full-floors, across hundreds of global locations in 30+ countries. Designed for both established enterprises and growing startups, these move-in ready spaces are optimized for productivity and collaboration, allowing businesses to save on real estate costs and efficiently expand their office footprint. Positioned as a key component of Total Rewards, WeWork empowers teams to work wherever they are, contributing to employee well-being, happiness, and engagement by offering flexible options to adapt to unique business needs and future-proof workplace strategies.
key_use_cases: Support for flexible and hybrid work models
Rapid team expansion and global market entry
Providing employee benefits related to workspace
competitive_advantages: Variety of flexible space solutions (coworking, private offices, full-floors)
Move-in ready spaces designed for productivity and collaboration
Ability to optimize office footprint and reduce real estate costs
Supports employee well-being and engagement through flexible work options
roi_benefits: Enhanced access to best-in-class office spaces for teams
Business agility through flexible space options
Future-proofing workplace strategy against changing needs
scalability_features: Flexible options for changing business needs
Range of workspace solutions from individual memberships to full floors
Global portfolio to support expansion across countries
